summary: Tested 3 new Growth Engine features: Recurring Calendar Events, Google Analytics Settings, and Authority Building System. All 19 backend tests passed. Frontend pages load correctly with all UI components.

ui_bugs.issue: Duplicate 'Analytics' import causing build error - FIXED during testing

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (width/height -1) - minor cosmetic issue

tests: POST /api/growth/calendar/events with recurrence=none creates 0 recurring instances
recurring_events.ui_verification: Content Calendar page shows 'Repeat' dropdown with options: Does not repeat, Daily, Weekly, Every 2 weeks, Monthly

tests: PUT /api/growth/analytics-settings with valid GA4 ID (G-xxx) succeeds
PUT /api/growth/analytics-settings with invalid GA4 ID returns 400
analytics_settings.ui_verification: Analytics Settings page shows GA4 Measurement ID input, Enable GA4 toggle, tracking options (Page Views, Blog Reads, Listing Views, Conversions, Anonymize IP), Save Settings and Test Connection buttons

authority_building.ui_verification: Authority Building page shows stats (Campaigns, Contacts, Links Won, Backlinks), 3 tabs (CAMPAIGNS, BACKLINKS, TEMPLATES), New Campaign button

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All pages load correctly, all components visible)

seed_data_creation: Test data with TEST_ prefix was created during testing and cleanup attempted
context_for_next_testing_agent: Three new features added: 1) Recurring events in Content Calendar with daily/weekly/biweekly/monthly options, 2) Google Analytics Settings page at /dashboard/analytics-settings with GA4 configuration, 3) Authority Building system at /dashboard/authority-building with campaigns, backlinks, and email templates tabs. Backend tests in test_growth_features_166.py cover all API endpoints.
